title: depict
text: depict R/RJava wrapper around wonderful depiction api written John May. entire CDK team, especially John, steadily improving visualization features CDK. depiction API succinct powerful provides access vary large amount end-user desired functionality small number composable functions. design API now relatively straightforward design simple streamlined interface allow users quickly easily generate beautiful graphics.

title: depict
text: can find usage documentation depict’s Github Website.

title: Basic-Use
text: simple wrapper around cdk’s excellent depict module.
code: library(depict)  # load a smiles string pen <- parse_smiles("CC1(C(N2C(S1)C(C2=O)NC(=O)CC3=CC=CC=C3)C(=O)[O-])C penicillin")  # `depiction` is the base class; styles are applied to it # `depict` applies the styles to the molecule depiction() |>   set_zoom(2) |>   depict(pen) |>   get_svg_string() |>   cat()

title: Basic-Use
code: # load a few smiles as AtomContainers atmcontainers <- purrr::map(   c("CCCC", "CCCCCC", "CCCC1CCC1CC2CCCC2"),   parse_smiles )  # convert them into a java iterable many_containers <- atomcontainer_list_to_jarray(atmcontainers)   depiction() |>   set_zoom(2) |>   depict(many_containers) |>   get_svg_string() |>   cat()

title: Basic-Use
code: # you must supply java colors color <- J("java.awt.Color")  # load in penicillin pen <- parse_smiles("CC1(C(N2C(S1)C(C2=O)NC(=O)CC3=CC=CC=C3)C(=O)[O-])C penicillin") cav <- parse_smiles("CN1C=NC2=C1C(=O)N(C(=O)N2C)C")  # define the regions to highlight # either all atoms/bonds # or a SMARTS-defined subregion atms <- pen$atoms() bnds <- pen$bonds() lactam <- match_smarts("C1(=O)NCC1", pen)  # use piping to change the behavior as desired depiction() |>   highlight_atoms(atms, color$LIGHT_GRAY) |>   highlight_atoms(bnds, color$LIGHT_GRAY) |>   highlight_atoms(lactam, color$RED) |>   set_zoom(2) |>   outerglow() |>   add_title() |>   depict(pen) |>   get_svg_string() |>   cat()

title: Basic-Use
code: small_highlight <- match_smarts("C1CCC1", many_containers)  depiction() |>   highlight_atoms(small_highlight, color$RED) |>   set_zoom(2) |>   outerglow() |>   add_title() |>   depict(many_containers) |>   get_svg_string() |>   cat()

title: Basic-Use
code: mol <- parse_smiles(paste("CC(n1c(C)ncc1c1ccnc(n1)Nc1ccc(cc1)S(=O)(=O)C)C",   "CMGC:CDC2:6gu3:A:FB8",   sep = " " ))  # imid      <- 'c1cnc[nH]1'  #1H-imidazole highlight_imid <- match_smarts("c1cncn1", mol) highlight_2 <- match_smarts("n1cccnc1Nc2ccccc2", mol)  color <- J("java.awt.Color")  depiction() |>   highlight_atoms(highlight_imid, color$GREEN) |>   highlight_atoms(highlight_2, color$RED) |>   set_zoom(2) |>   outerglow() |>   add_title() |>   depict(mol) |>   get_svg_string() |>   cat()

title: Basic-Use
code: # loading a molfile insulinmol <- system.file("molfiles/ChEBI_5931.mol", package = "depict") insulin <- read_mol(insulinmol)  cysteine <- match_smarts("C(=O)C(CS)N", insulin) xlinks <- match_smarts("SS", insulin)  depiction() |>   set_zoom(0.7) |>   outerglow() |>   highlight_atoms(cysteine, color$YELLOW) |>   highlight_atoms(xlinks, color$YELLOW) |>   depict(insulin) |>   get_svg_string() |>   cat()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Charlop-Powers Z (2024). depict: Draw Beautiful Molecular Structures. R package version 0.4.0, https://cdk-r.github.io/depict/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {depict: Draw Beautiful Molecular Structures},   author = {Zachary Charlop-Powers},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.4.0},   url = {https://cdk-r.github.io/depict/}, }

title: depict 0.3.0
text: modify match_smarts use toChemObjects methodinstead toAtomBondMap due issue Java reflection. add atomcontainer_list_to_jarray allow passing arrays molecules depict Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
